title: Best of The Herd: 10/31/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/31/2019
description:
Colin says the Astros lost the World Series because their best players didn't hit, not because they made a pitching change. Despite Baker's outburst towards the media Colin actually thinks the Browns are about to become a playoff contender and he explains why. He says there is a silver lining to Steph Curry breaking his hand. Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about Lamar Jackson vs the Patriots and tells Colin why Jimmy Garoppolo isn't all that important to the 49ers. Plus, Colin gives his three best bets of the college football weekend including some upsets in the Pac-12.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
